c3bc2a65-846e-43b4-aaea-9face95d6498.name: Alternate Benefit
c3bc2a65-846e-43b4-aaea-9face95d6498.notes: Bonus to resist deception involving numbers

dd3f1278-19da-401c-b9f5-6b7bcaa05be5.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
dd3f1278-19da-401c-b9f5-6b7bcaa05be5.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

af75b251-59af-4aed-b5d0-3e31d42503f5.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
af75b251-59af-4aed-b5d0-3e31d42503f5.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks
